scripts.serve: nodemon --ignore ./build --exec cross-env NODE_ENV=localhost babel-node src/index.js --signal SIGTERM
scripts.production: export NODE_ENV=production && npm run build && babel-node src/index.js
scripts.testing: export NODE_ENV=testing && npm run build && babel-node src/index.js
scripts.staging: export NODE_ENV=staging && npm run build && babel-node src/index.js
